58626.summary: Some customers in the Daniel McIntyre area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
58626.title: Mar 6 - Winnipeg (Daniel McIntyre) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Services have been stabilized and the issue is now resolved. We thank you for your patience during the interruption.
